pages.text: Abejas para materiales de Mecanismo. Aquí solo se muestran abejas de materiales especiales, para materiales comunes como el cobre y el estaño, vaya al $(l:bees/modded/ingot_bees)lista de abejas lingoteras$(/l)

pages.title: Osmium Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive/iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary/neon_cuckoo)Neon Cuckoo Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism

pages.title: Refined Glowstone Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/modded/mekanism#osmium)Osmium Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild/glowing)Glowing Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism

pages.title: Refined Obsidian Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/modded/mekanism#osmium)Osmium Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/hive/obsidian)Obsidian Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism
